jobs.title: Associate Intern
jobs.description:
Dawn is looking to recruit a paid Intern to support the team for a period of 2-6 months, starting from December.


THE ROLE
- Marketing Support - we will be activating a weekly Email, Podcast, and social channels. The primary interest from applicants needs to be a deep consumer marketing passion - if you understand people, how they think, and what makes them ‘click’, and are desperate to learn more, this is the role for you.
- Ongoing research in the competitive environment and trends
- Customer development - investigating and interviewing prospective customers to better understand and define our work
- Community management - a passion for how communities operate, grow, and stay engaged.
- Take part in creating the Dawn Podcast - research, transcripts, editing, liaising with incredible guests. Turning what they say into powerful marketing communications to reach listeners.
- Contribute new growth ideas and learning how the growth process works, which requires an interest in data.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR
- Excited about working in a Start-Up environment 
- Proactive, creative, self-motivated and ready to hit the ground running
- Growth Mindset/entrepreneurially minded - essential. Before asking any question to founders using a ‘Have I already Googled this/looked it up myself?’.
- Interest in human performance & psychology - why people do what they do (passion for marketing)
- Data-driven and creative 

INTERESTED?
Get in touch with a copy of your C.V. and why you want to get involved with Dawn.

Dawn is looking to recruit a paid Intern to support the team for a period of 2-6 months, starting from December.

THE ROLE

  • Marketing Support - we will be activating a weekly Email, Podcast, and social channels. The primary interest from applicants needs to be a deep consumer marketing passion - if you understand people, how they think, and what makes them ‘click’, and are desperate to learn more, this is the role for you.
  • Ongoing research in the competitive environment and trends
  • Customer development - investigating and interviewing prospective customers to better understand and define our work
  • Community management - a passion for how communities operate, grow, and stay engaged.
  • Take part in creating the Dawn Podcast - research, transcripts, editing, liaising with incredible guests. Turning what they say into powerful marketing communications to reach listeners.
  • Contribute new growth ideas and learning how the growth process works, which requires an interest in data.

WHAT WE'RE LOOKING FOR

  • Excited about working in a Start-Up environment
  • Proactive, creative, self-motivated and ready to hit the ground running
  • Growth Mindset/entrepreneurially minded - essential. Before asking any question to founders using a ‘Have I already Googled this/looked it up myself?’.
  • Interest in human performance & psychology - why people do what they do (passion for marketing)
  • Data-driven and creative

INTERESTED?
Get in touch with a copy of your C.V. and why you want to get involved with Dawn.
